member.name: T:CmdOneLinerNET.CmdOneLiner
member.summary: Allows easily executing a command line application in one line of code.

member.name: M:CmdOneLinerNET.CmdOneLiner.Run(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.Nullable{System.Threading.CancellationToken},System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass,CmdOneLinerNET.IOPriorityClass)
member.param: Command to execute, and its arguments
Path to working directory. If null, the current one () will be used.
If not null, the command will be killed after the given timeout.
Optional object used to kill the process on demand.

member.name: M:CmdOneLinerNET.CmdOneLiner.RunInBackground(System.String,System.Action{System.ValueTuple{System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.Int64,System.TimeSpan,System.TimeSpan}},System.String,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.Nullable{System.Threading.CancellationToken})
member.param: Command to execute, and its arguments
Path to working directory. If null, the current one () will be used.
If not null, the command will be killed after the given timeout.
Optional object used to kill the process on demand.
